comment: Too syrupy.  Horrible on its own, must be mixed with something.  Wife like it though.
a lovely peach flavor that works fantastic with flavored sparkling ice lemonade.

Good peach taste, but it’s waaaay too sweet. I mixed it with iced tea on a hot evening, the first sip was syrupy sweet. If you swirled the cup before each sip, it helped, otherwise the liqueur settlers to the bottom and you would get a punch of sweetness in your straw
-Not bad, definitely has peach taste but also kind of minty for some reason. Strong at first then smooth
Great for mixing for sangrias or summer cocktails
